h:head.h:title: 3. BOTSWANA SCH/STH Mid Term Evaluation - Kato Katz Form V2

text.value: The code must be a two-digit number between 10 and 99
The code must be a two-digit number between 01 and 60
2 digit code assigned to each school
The format must be like CH-01-01
Enter unique ID from the diagnostic test (e.g. AB-01-01)
The repeated code must be the same
